project.name: XBee IOSamples Coordinator Radio Example Activity
project.description: This Java-based activity drives an XBee coordinator radio and talks to a remote radio. The remote radio will be set up by the activity to have DIO9 be an analog input and DIO1 be a digital input. The sample time is set at 1 second.

property.name: space.hardware.serial.port
property.description: The serial port the XBee is attached to. In Linux it will have a value like /dev/ttyUSB0. This is usually added in the Live Activity configuration in the Master Web Admin.

property.name: xbee.remote.address64
property.description: The 64 bit hexadecimal address for the remote XBee to be talked to. It will have a value like 0013a200407bd2e3. This is usually added in the Live Activity configuration in the Master Web Admin.
